content.rendered:
Dr Ariyawansha is a successful senior management professional having served as Senior Marketing Manager of a leading telecommunication company in Asia, and as a Visiting Lecturer for postgraduate courses in marketing for a leading regional awarding body. She has 20 years of industry experience in Business Administration, Marketing and 9 years in Higher Education in the UK. She has also served as a visiting lecturer at a number of England based universities and colleges.

Her specialism of teaching is in the subject areas of Marketing Strategy, Business Management, Strategic Human Resource Management, Strategic Leadership & Management and dissertation supervisory within the higher education sphere. She has successfully presented at International Business Conferences and Executive Training workshops and seminars, blending academic rigour with practical business experience both in the UK and abroad. She has an extensive publication record in peer-reviewed journals such as GBATA (USA) and SRHE (UK). Dr Priyangani is an active member of the Society for Research into Higher Education (SRHE) in the UK.
